questions.question: Focus on the "female" group and analyze the characteristics that can be used to distinguish this group from the others.

answer.value: The mean of price of haircare of the "female" group was the lowest, clearly differentiating it from the other groups.

key_insights: The mean of price of haircare for the female group was the lowest, which might be a distinguishing feature from the other groups.
The remaining two product types did not exhibit any distinct characteristics among the customer demographics.

reasoning.reasoning: Use the tool to switch to the group mode to facilitate an intuitive analysis of the differences in product types among various customer groups.
Use tools to eliminate "haircare", and then analyze the characteristics of the remaining two product types in different customer groups.
